actions: Breaks up Blood Stasis, invigorates Blood circulation, moistens the Intestines and unblocks the bowels.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, opens the channels and alleviates pain.
With Tao Ren, invigorates the Blood for all types of Blood Stagnation.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin and generates fluids.
Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Yin and clears Deficiency Heat.
Clears Heat, transforms Hot Phlegm, expands the chest, moistens the Intestines and promotes bowel movements.
Tonifies the Middle Jiao, augments Qi and nourishes the Blood.
Spreads and regulates Liver Qi and alleviates pain.
With Yan Hu Suo, treats everything from Liver Qi Stagnation to Deep Blood Stasis with pain anywhere in the body including stabbing chest pain.
Moistens the Lungs, nourishes Stomach Yin, clears the Heart and eliminates irritability.
Invigorates the Blood, circulates Qi and stops pain.

syndromes: Liver and Kidney Qi and Yin Deficiency with Blood Stagnation

manifestations.tongue: Red and dry or Red and swollen
manifestations.pulse: Thready and weak or Thready and rapid or Bound or Regularly interrupted

contraindications: If there is essential hypertension or if the blood pressure rises after administration of this formula, reduce the amount of Rx. Glycyrrhizae Gan Cao to 9 grams. Substituting Rx. Glycyrrhizae Preparata Zhi Gan Cao can also ameliorate this problem.

modifications.purpose: coronary Heart disease with palpitations and arrhythmia
